knowledgeAwareCoordinationWorkflows.description: Advanced coordination patterns leveraging MCP Resources for intelligent swarm behavior

discovery_driven_architecture.description: Architectural decisions driven by knowledge discovery

workflow.action: Browse memory://insights for emerging architectural trends
Create architectural entities building on discovered foundations
Create relationships linking new architecture to existing patterns

success_criteria: Architecture builds on existing proven patterns
Clear relationships established to existing knowledge
Architectural decisions documented for future reuse

rapid_knowledge_synthesis.description: Fast development through intelligent knowledge reuse

workflow.action: Browse memory://search/ux for delightful design patterns
Rapidly implement by combining existing patterns
Inject creative elements building on UX patterns
Document new synthesis patterns for future reuse
workflow.output: Enhanced knowledge graph with synthesis patterns

success_criteria: Development time reduced through pattern reuse
Creative elements enhance rather than disrupt

team_performance_optimization.description: Continuous team improvement through memory analytics

workflow.action: Analyze memory://insights for team performance patterns
Browse memory://projects for high-performing project patterns
Create coaching entities with personalized guidance
Track improvement metrics and optimize knowledge sharing

memory_resource_handoff.description: Seamless agent handoffs using memory resources

outgoing_agent: Create handoff entity with current context

incoming_agent: Review memory://relations for full context understanding
Update handoff entity with acceptance and understanding
Create new entities addressing identified gaps
Establish relationships connecting to ongoing work
Document handoff learnings for future optimization

knowledge_graph_collaboration.description: Agents collaborate through shared knowledge graph evolution

discovery_collaboration.pattern: Agents discover each other's work through memory browsing
actions: Agent A creates entities with clear, discoverable observations
Agent B browses memory://entities to discover relevant work
Agent B creates complementary entities building on Agent A's foundation
Both agents establish relationships connecting their contributions

pattern_sharing.pattern: Agents share successful patterns through knowledge documentation
actions: Agent documents successful pattern as reusable entity
Other agents discover pattern via memory://search/{domain}
Agents adapt pattern to their specific contexts

collective_intelligence.pattern: Multiple agents contribute to comprehensive knowledge domains
actions: Agents contribute specialized knowledge to shared domains
Memory Shepherd optimizes relationships for discoverability
Agents leverage collective knowledge for enhanced capabilities
Knowledge graph evolves to support emergent intelligence

knowledge_amplification.description: Agent capabilities amplified through knowledge graph leverage
mechanisms: Agents access expertise beyond their individual capabilities
Patterns emerge from collective knowledge contributions
Specialized knowledge becomes accessible to all agents

adaptive_specialization.description: Agents develop specialized expertise based on knowledge patterns
mechanisms: Agents identify knowledge domains with high value/low coverage
Specialization evolves based on successful pattern applications

swarm_learning.description: Collective learning through shared knowledge evolution
mechanisms: Successful patterns propagate through memory browsing
Failed approaches documented to prevent repetition
Knowledge quality improves through collective validation

knowledge_reuse_rate.description: Percentage of new entities that build on existing knowledge
knowledge_reuse_rate.measurement: Track entity relationships to existing knowledge

discovery_efficiency.description: Time to find relevant existing knowledge
discovery_efficiency.measurement: Memory resource access patterns and timing

knowledge_compound_rate.description: Rate at which knowledge builds on itself
knowledge_compound_rate.measurement: Relationship creation rate vs entity creation rate

agent_capability_amplification.description: Improvement in agent performance through knowledge access
agent_capability_amplification.measurement: Compare performance with/without memory resource access

preparation: Knowledge graph provides context for dynamic prompt generation
Agent templates become prompt composition templates
Memory patterns guide prompt optimization strategies
Relationship networks enable prompt chaining workflows
anticipated_benefits: Adaptive prompt optimization based on knowledge patterns
Collaborative prompt development through knowledge sharing
Prompt templates that leverage collective intelligence

preparation: Memory insights inform sampling strategy optimization
Knowledge patterns guide intelligent sampling decisions
Agent performance data enables adaptive sampling
anticipated_benefits: Intelligent sampling based on knowledge patterns
Adaptive sampling strategies driven by performance data
